sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be added to each of the numbers \(10 \), \(18 \), \(27 \), and \(37 \) to make them proportional.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "Lets suppose that the required number is $z $.

Since the numbers $10 + z $, $18 + z $, $27 + z $, $37 + z $ are in proportion, we have
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{} + z }{18 + z } = \frac{\input[s1v2]{} + z }{37 + z }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (10 + z )(37 + z ) = (18 + z )(27 + z )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 370 + z (\input[s2v1]{} ) + z ^2 = 486 + z (\input[s2v2]{} ) + z ^2
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z (47 - 45 ) = 486 - 370 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{486 - 370 }{47 - 45 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{\input[s3v2]{} }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{58 }{1 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [10, 27], "text": "Four numbers are proportional when $a:b::c:d$, thus, using this result we get \frac{10 + z }{18 + z } = \frac{27 + z }{37 + z }"}, {"data": [47, 45], "text": " Upon cross- multiplication and further simplification we get \[
	z = \frac{486 - 370 }{47 - 45 }
\]"}, {"data": [116, 2], "text": "Further simplification will give us the result as z = \frac{58 }{1 } "}]
